label: Activity two
heading: Dealer's choice
text: I have curated a selection of activities for you to choose from for the afternoon portion of the day.

options.heading: Museums
options.text: Would you like to experience some cool stuff?
modal: The museum has some amazing displays and activities.
There's a guided code-breaking tour if didn't get enough problem solving this morning x
There's also virtual reality experiences and heaps of exhibitions for us to try.

options.heading: Art
modal: The art gallery is also a great place to get cultured and open our minds to a little bit more.

options.heading: Shopping
options.text: If all else fails we can walk around the shops and enjoy a cocktail xxx
modal: There's not much more to say for this one but I made the other two modals and I thought it would be anticlimactic if it didn't make this a modal too x

label: Transport
heading: Park and change
text: Our dinner reservation is for 6pm and our next activity ends at 5:20.
To avoid rushing, let's whip out the fancy dress x

label: Activity three
heading: Movies
text: Let's go watch a movie. It's not the one you think but I reckon you're going to really enjoy it x
